org.apache.juneau.rest.client2

Interface RestCallInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRestCallLogger, ConsoleRestCallLogger, RestCallLogger

    public interface RestCallInterceptor
    Used to intercept http connection responses to allow modification of that response before processing and for listening for call lifecycle events.

    Useful if you want to prevent RestCallExceptions from being thrown on error conditions.

    • RestClient.RESTCLIENT_interceptors
    • RestClientBuilder.interceptors(Class...)
    • RestClientBuilder.interceptors(RestCallInterceptor...)

    • Method Summary
